thread.title: The X-Files: Deal Nearly in Place for More Episodes
thread.title_full: The X-Files: Deal Nearly in Place for More Episodes

author: Eric Goldman
title: The X-Files: Deal Nearly in Place for More Episodes
text:
After its ratings success in 2016, The X-Files is almost certainly returning for more episodes, though the deal still needs to be finalized with series creator Chris Carter and stars David Duchovny and Gillian Anderson. 
Asked about doing more X-Files episodes at the TCA (Television Critics Association) press tour today, FOX's President, Entertainment, David Madden said, “We hope so. There’s a lot of conversations going on. These conversations are complex, but we hope to be able to announce something shortly.” 
EW also reported that Madden revealed that they were originally hoping to officially announce more episodes today, but the deals weren’t completed in time. 
Continue reading…
